title: Incept eSports LF a Diamond+ Jungler and Top laner
body:
Incept eSports is recruiting for a Jungler and Top laner that has the dedication and motivation to join our squad and advance to OCS and be on. 

What is required?
-A working Mic
-TS or Discord (pref both) 
-Speaks English
-has a wide Champion Pool
-Willing to dedicate time to Team training, tournaments and other events
-willing to adapt to the Meta, as it changes

If interested, Contact Process though the Game for more information.

replies.body: im d3 jungle main, champ pool isnt wide but focusing on other champs during preseason, current junglers inc yi, elise, jarvan, xin, grag
